pkgmetadata.longdescription: Methods for Time Series Analysis // A collection of functions to perform Detrended Fluctuation Analysis (DFA exponent), GUEDES et al. (2019) doi:10.1016/j.physa.2019.04.132 , Detrended cross-correlation coefficient (RHODCCA), GUEDES ZEBENDE (2019) doi:10.1016/j.physa.2019.121286, and Multiple Detrended cross- correlation coefficient (DMC), ZEBENDE SILVA-FILHO (2018) doi:10.1016/j.physa.2018.06.119, both with sliding windows approach.
